title: Should Sword of the Divine be brought back?

replies.body:
Stupid item and was just made to make AD assassin's stupid.

It meant being able to build flat AD past a small cheap item because all the stats existed on this item for combat.

And especially now with most AD items being stupidly strong that would be even worse.
free 3 crits on assassins with 100% ad focused build with no crit, what could go wrong
